name: The Amazonian Dread
description: An ethnobotanist’s research foray deep in the Amazonian jungle of papaluco turns into a deadly fight for survival…
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: windows 8 64bit or higher Processor: core i3 @ 3.30GHz or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or equivalent Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
